title: Swarms Configuration
description: Configuration schema for MAIL swarm definitions

version.description: Version of the MAIL reference implementation to be used

entrypoint.description: Name of the agent that serves as the entry point for the swarm

agents.description: List of agents in the swarm

actions.description: List of actions available to agents in the swarm

name.description: Unique identifier for the agent within the swarm

factory.description: Python module path to the agent factory function. Supports 'python::' prefix (e.g., 'python::module.path:factory_function') or 'url::' prefix to fetch from a URL

comm_targets.description: List of agents this agent can communicate with. Can include local agent names or remote agents using agent@swarm syntax

enable_entrypoint.description: Whether this agent can serve as an entry point

enable_interswarm.description: Whether this agent can participate in inter-swarm communication

can_complete_tasks.description: Whether this agent has the ability to mark tasks as complete

tool_format.description: The format of tools this agent uses

actions.description: List of action names this agent can perform

agent_params.description: Parameters passed to the agent factory. Contents are defined by the implementer and can contain any properties

description.description: Human-readable description of what the action does

parameters.description: JSON Schema definition of the action's parameters

function.description: Python module path to the function that implements the action. Supports 'python::' prefix (e.g., 'python::module.path:function_name') or 'url::' prefix to fetch from a URL
